data.Title: OpenAI Launches SearchGPT Beta to Compete with Google
data.Description: OpenAI is launching a test version of its long-awaited search engine, SearchGPT, which will summarize the information found on websites, including news sites.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Introduces AI-Powered Search Results
data.Description: Microsoft's Bing is rolling out an AI-powered "generative search" feature to rival Google.  The new search results page shunts traditional web results to the right in favor of generative AI summaries.

data.Title: Reddit Blocks Bing and Other Search Engines, Citing AI Training Concerns
data.Description: Reddit updated its robots.txt file to prohibit most search engine and AI crawlers from accessing its content - including blocking Microsoft Bing. Reddit did not block Google Search.

data.Title: Google to Test Ads Within AI Overviews
data.Description: Google will soon enable advertisers to appear WITHIN the AI overviews. Ads above and below the AI overviews have proven helpful for people.

data.Title: Google Reports Strong Q2 2024 Earnings, Driven by Search and Cloud
data.Description: Alphabet's revenue was up 14% year over year, driven by search as well as cloud, which surpassed $10 billion in quarterly revenues and $1 billion in operating profit for the first time.
